title: Power cut only for One Province tomorrow
content: The Ceylon Electricity Board says that it will be possible to provide electricity without any cuts today as the demand is low.Meanwhile, Public Utilities Commission announced that only one to one-&-a-half hours power cuts will be implemented within the Southern Province tomorrow (Monday, 21 February).The Schedule for Southern province power cut will be notified befor 12 noon tomorrow, PUCSL chairman Janaka Ratnayake said.He said that all other province will get Electricity without any interruption.
